# EconomyBorg - Gold Efficiency Maximizer
# Generated by: Gemini 3.0
# Strategy: Treat dungeon as resource extraction operation.
# Maximize "Mobs per Hour" = Gold per Hour.

# Worships
borg_worships_damage = TRUE
borg_worships_speed = TRUE
borg_worships_hp = FALSE
borg_worships_mana = FALSE
borg_worships_ac = FALSE
borg_worships_gold = TRUE

# Behavior
borg_plays_risky = FALSE
borg_kills_uniques = TRUE
borg_uses_swaps = TRUE
borg_no_deeper = 45
borg_cheat_death = FALSE

# Depth 45 is sweet spot: stat potions + high-tier loot
# but usually safe for well-equipped character.
# Uniques are "jackpots" for artifact drops.
